name: Croworks.
description:
The world has been devastated by a terrible pandemic

The disaster and chaos did not stop, but it did not end completely. Understood... There is no cure. But nothing that affects you, you're just a crow in the old world "of humans", devastated by its strange condition, the imminent Night Life.

The beta, only comes before the first boss, (no boss battles, timing issues sorry)

Controls (IMPORTANT)

DO NOT AUTO SAVE

W-Up, collect items, Interact.

A- Left

S- Down, drop item.

D- Right

Left Click: Launch Projectiles, Dash

Right click: aim (if projectiles are available)

Ctrl+O: emergency restart (if you don't save, you will lose all progress, save your progress in tree rooms whenever you can!)

I hope you have fun!

"This project will possibly be updated after the Jam."

Collaborators:

"SEoR Livion or Symphonys#1074" - All Music and SFX

"MightyNeko" - Programmer and Pixel Art

"Nn2" - Cover for itch.io
